main.name: Yaw-An Shieh
main.description: I converted it to the Typescript version and stopped using the jQuery library here, and I hope this website will help you know more about me.
main.bio: Hello, I am a man who loves to solve problems and might forget to get his meal. My favorite sport is snowboarding, although I live on an island with a subtropical climate and rarely see snow. In the era of booming online courses, I am fortunate to learn lots of skills and keep moving up. Lately, I have finished some web development courses on Udemy and Youtube. I hope to have the opportunity to work with you in the future. Thank you.
main.contactMessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Relevant Coursework: Practical Data Structures and Algorithms / Machine Vision and Image Processing Algorithm / Soft Computing Methods and Applications

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: I took over and maintained the internal web application, such as the performance evaluation system, developed new features in .Net, C# MVC, Vuejs with Bootstrap. It was my first time working on a web application. I found everything was new and fascinating to make interfaces more friendly and manipulatable. Therefore, I started to devote myself to front-end development.

work.title: Software/Firmware Engineer
work.description: I participated in almost all automation projects then, and I was responsible for image process algorithms such as blemish inspection and image quality checking for lens modules. It made quality control more reliable instead of subjective judgments on product inspections. As for battery charger design, the firmware development experience gave me a chance to know how an MCU works. It also allowed me to implement a state machine design to control charging behavior.

projects.title: Resume Website using Typescript
projects.category: A React based resume website template

testimonials.text: I have had the good fortune to have worked with Yaw-An Shieh over the past 3 years in my capacity of Associate Vice President of Software Engineering at PEGATRON Corporation. During this time    Yaw-An has demonstrated deep multi-disciplinary expertise in firmware development and software integration.
